General.Name: Mustika Ratu Tbk
General.Description: PT Mustika Ratu Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, trading, and distribution of herbal and traditional cosmetics, body care products, jamu, health drinks, ready to drink products, and other related products in Indonesia. Its products include essential oil, face care, feminine, hair care, massage oil, oral care, perfume, sanitizer, and women's care products; Herbamuno+, fat burning, health caplets, maternity, and supplements; and tea series, wedang series, jejamu, and Fitsho+. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Mustika Ratu Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mustika Ratu Investama.
